name: Pixel City Survival Simulator 3D
description:
Greetings, stranger! Oh, you can’t remember, what happened yesterday? Be sure, it was something terrible, and now you are the only survivor in this lost city made of pixels and blocks! Danger awaits in every dark place, so you must use all of your hunting, battling and exploration skills to avoid wild animals attacks and survive here! Explore ruined houses, look for treasures, quarry resources to craft weapons and survival tools and build shelters. Be ready for extreme adventures – it’s a kind of dead city, not tropical survival island! Explore this cruel and mysterious wasteland with Pixel City Survival Simulator 3D!

Feel the dark side of stalker’s life playing this city survival simulator in 3D! No one knows, what really happened here – it could be a nuclear explosion, zombie pandemic, natural disaster or even a civil war. So, you must explore this lost cube city trying to unravel its secrets and mysteries. Who are you? Usual tramp or a stalker? Get to know playing this ultimate 3D game!

Complete missions, look for weapons or survival tools and don’t forget to mind character’s indicators playing this stalker simulator in 3D! Keep your health, thirst and fullness rates in green zone - if one of these drops, you’ll lost your chance to survive! Try to survive in this concrete jungles – gather plant food, hunt for wild animal flooded this uninhabited city or learn to fish. Tired of playing island survival simulators? Raise up your fighting or survival skills to stay alive exploring this wasteland! Find pixel treasures and cube weapons, craft useful tools, build blocky shelters and feel like a real stalker playing Pixel City Survival Simulator 3D game!

Fight for your life on the city streets, search for food or resources and protect them from street gangers – these city apex predators are more dangerous than any animal. Build shelters and craft weapons – you certainly find them useful! It’s not a resort or Tropical survival Island – forget about the picturesque ocean, juicy fruits and nice weather! Today your goal is to explore this dead, lost city. Be ready for ultimate city survival adventures – provide yourself with food hunting aggressive predators, build shelter and craft clothes not to get frozen! Here you can't depend on anyone, but yourself, so hunt, fight, rob, steal and explore with Pixel City Survival Simulator 3D!

Pixel City Survival Simulator 3D features:

- Ultimate lost city survival simulator – living the life of a stalker is not like chilling on desert survival island, I bet!
- Hunt, gather and explore – provide yourself with food fighting against wild animals, rebuff predators’ attacks, quarry resources to craft weapons or build shelters
- Mind survivor’s indicators to stay alive
- Amazing 3D graphics – it’s all made of pixels, cubes and blocks here
- Choose your own lifestyle – live a peaceful life of a tramp digging through garbage trying to find reach loot or explore this dangerous wasteland keeping your gun alert
- Great stalker simulator

Stay alive in this concrete jungles playing this stalker simulator. Unravel all the secrets, and find the answer to the main question – what’s really have happened here? War, nuclear explosion or any other disaster? Was it your fault? Dive into the atmosphere of city extreme survival adventures – hunt, battle, search and explore like a real survivor! Thrive in this hostile environments with Pixel City Survival Simulator 3D! Interesting missions, new crafting system and even more for real survival games fans!

Tired of playing island survival simulators? Raise up you skills and stay alive exploring this wasteland playing ultimate city survival simulator in 3D!
